columns.name: name
columns.description: The custom name of the job.

columns.name: job_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the job.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the job.

columns.name: job_status
columns.description: The status of a classification job.

columns.name: job_type
columns.description: The schedule for running a classification job.

columns.name: client_token
columns.description: The token that was provided to ensure the idempotency of the request to create the job.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The date and time, in UTC and extended ISO 8601 format, when the job was created.

columns.name: last_run_time
columns.description: This value indicates when the most recent run started.

columns.name: sampling_percentage
columns.description: The sampling depth, as a percentage, that determines the percentage of eligible objects that the job analyzes.

columns.name: bucket_definitions
columns.description: The namespace of the AWS service that provides the resource, or a custom-resource.

columns.name: custom_data_identifier_ids
columns.description: The custom data identifiers that the job uses to analyze data.

columns.name: last_run_error_status
columns.description: Specifies whether any account- or bucket-level access errors occurred when a classification job ran.

columns.name: s3_job_definition
columns.description: Specifies which S3 buckets contain the objects that a classification job analyzes, and the scope of that analysis.

columns.name: schedule_frequency
columns.description: Specifies the recurrence pattern for running a classification job.

columns.name: statistics
columns.description: Provides processing statistics for a classification job.

columns.name: user_paused_details
columns.description: Provides information about when a classification job was paused.
